UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: An optimized analog of antimicrobial peptide Jelleine-1 shows enhanced antimicrobial activity against multidrug resistant P. aeruginosa and negligible toxicity in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Zhou J, Zhang L, He Y, Liu K, Zhang F, Zhang H, Lu Y, Yang C, Wang Z, Fareed MS, Liang X, Yan W, Wang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µM),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC 29544(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=16µM)
